constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 13 (Thursday, January 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARAMENDI:
H.R. 6444.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I. Section 8, Clauses 1 and 14 of the U.S.
Constitution
[Page H289]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To provide for the conveyance of a small parcel of real property at Beale Air Force Base in California to the Three Rivers Levee Improvement Authority.
